alliances.label: Maritime Trading League
alliances.summary: Longstanding coalition of coastal states coordinating trade policy, convoys, and port privileges.

alliances.label: Coastal Defense Compact
alliances.summary: Regional pact of nearby coastal polities for joint naval patrols and harbor defenses.

alliances.label: Inner-Coastal Accord
alliances.summary: Temporary inland-coastal alignment to secure overland access to major ports.

alliances.label: Island Mercantile Pact
alliances.summary: Bilateral commercial and non-aggression agreement between two closely linked coastal states.

alliances.label: Northern Fishing Coalition
alliances.summary: Earlier cooperative arrangement pooling fishing rights and maintenance of shared infrastructure.

wars_conflicts.label: Great Naval War
wars_conflicts.summary: Major multi-state naval conflict over trade routes and port hegemony that redistributed coastal influence.

wars_conflicts.label: Border War of the Lowlands
wars_conflicts.summary: Short inland border war between an interior state and an adjacent coastal polity over fertile lowland control.

wars_conflicts.label: Pirate Suppression Campaign
wars_conflicts.summary: Coastal coalition campaign to eliminate organized piracy disrupting merchant convoys.

wars_conflicts.label: Succession Crisis of State_2
wars_conflicts.summary: Internal succession conflict in a coastal polity that drew intervention from nearby states and altered local alliances.

treaties.label: Open-Seas Treaty
clauses: Mutual freedom of navigation and port access for signatories
Prohibition on state-sanctioned privateering among members
Joint dispute arbitration council for maritime incidents

treaties.label: River Boundary Accord
clauses: Fixed boundary along the lowland river course
Demilitarized buffer zone and shared flood management

treaties.label: Fisheries Sharing Agreement
clauses: Quota allocation for shared fishing grounds

treaties.label: Migration and Settlement Protocol
clauses: Temporary settlement permits for displaced coastal migrants
Land grants with local administration oversight
Mechanism for integrating traders and craftsmen

trade_blocs.label: Coastal-River Commerce Ring
notes: Integrated riverine and port transit fees

border_changes.label: Lowland Cession
border_changes.summary: Coastal state ceded contested lowland strip to interior neighbor as part of a boundary treaty.

border_changes.label: Maritime Boundary Recalibration
border_changes.summary: Adjustment of maritime zones between two island/coastal states to clarify fishing and trade rights.

border_changes.label: Coastal Acquisition via Succession
border_changes.summary: Territorial transfer along the coast following dynastic collapse and inheritance claims.

border_changes.label: Territorial Shifts after Great Naval War
border_changes.summary: Several coastal holdings changed hands after decisive naval engagements and subsequent settlements.

cross_state_themes: Maritime trade networks shape politics and wealth distribution
Persistent coastal piracy and periodic suppression campaigns
Riverine/inland access as a driver of inland-coastal alliances
Fisheries and marine resources as recurring sources of conflict and cooperation
Treaty-driven maritime boundary management to reduce open conflict
Migration flows from coastal stressors altering inland demographics
notes: Coastal vs inland designations used where provided; adjacency assumptions kept generic and plausible.
Dates are coarse YBP estimates; '0' end_ybp indicates ongoing relations at present.
Checksum is a local identifier for this outline; verify against source data if needed.
